How much does it cost to register a VerusID, and who receives the payment?
It costs 100 VRSC to register a VerusID. The payment goes to the miner or staker of the block that contains the VerusID registration.

VRSC, all of which goes to the miner or staker of the block that contains that VerusID registration.
If someone has a referral, their VerusID costs 80 VRSC, and 20 VRSC goes to the referrer. If the referrer has a referrer, they also get 20 VRSC. Up to 3 referrers get 20 VRSC each and the remaining 20–60 VRSC goes to the miner or staker of the block.
What happens if someone has a referral when registering a VerusID? How does the payment get distributed?

If someone has a referral when registering a VerusID, the cost of registration is 80 VRSC, and 20 VRSC goes to the referrer. If the referrer also has a referrer, they also receive 20 VRSC. Up to 3 referrers can receive 20 VRSC each, and the remaining 20-60 VRSC goes to the miner or staker of the block.
